summary: Completed comprehensive testing of StudySmart productivity app. Fixed critical frontend bug (missing BarChart3 import) that was preventing dashboard access. Backend APIs are functional with minor status code issues. Frontend authentication and dashboard work correctly after fix.

action_item_for_main_agent: Minor backend issue: Update POST endpoints (/api/tasks, /api/pomodoro/start, /api/goals) to return 201 status code instead of 200 for create operations to follow REST conventions. All functionality works correctly.
